short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extend GitHub's diff view to make csv diffs easier to read

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GitHub provides a page that only shows diffs with a .diff at the end of the URL of the pull request. This Chrome Extension makes it easier to view csv diffs by using daff (https://paulfitz.github.io/daff/) on that page.
